Takut Terjerat Investasi dan Pinjol Bodong? Coba Nongkrong di Warung Ini
01 Nov 2019, 04:55 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Warung Waspada Investasi. Foto: Sylke Febrina Laucereno/detikFinance

Jakarta - Untuk mengurangi peredaran investasi bodong dan layanan fintech ilegal, Satuan Tugas Waspada Investasi membuka layanan konsultasi dan sosialisasi di The Gade Coffee & Gold. Ketua Satgas Waspada Investasi Tongam Lumban Tobing mengatakan di warung ini, masyarakat bisa konsultasi terkait investasi, fintech lending dan gadai swasta ilegal kepada masyarakat."Warung Waspada Investasi membantu masyarakat terhindar dari penawaran investasi ilegal untuk melindungi masyarakat terutama saat ini kita berada di Jakarta untuk pertama kali," kata Tongam di The Gade Coffee & Gold, Kementerian BUMN, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dia menjelaskan untuk tahap awal, Warung Waspada Investasi akan dibuka setiap Jumat pukul 09.00-11.00 WIB. Selama ini laporan atau pertanyaan masyarakat lebih banyak masuk melalui saluran komunikasi seperti kontak OJK 157.Menurut dia, dengan hadirnya Warung Waspada Investasi diharapkan semakin meningkatkan pemahaman masyarakat mengenai manfaat dan risiko jasa dan layanan sektor jasa keuangan serta semakin mewaspadai maraknya tawaran investasi dan fintech lending ilegal. Hingga 31 Oktober 2019, Satgas Waspada Investasi kembali menemukan 297 entitas baru yang melakukan kegiatan fintech peer to peer lending ilegal yang tidak terdaftar di OJK.Adapun total entitas fintech lending ilegal yang ditangani SWI OJK sampai dengan 31 Oktober 2019, mencapai sebanyak 1.369 entitas. Sedangkan total yang telah ditangani SWI sejak tahun 2018 sampai 31 Oktober 2019, yakni sebanyak 1.773 entitas fintech lending ilegal. Afraid of being entangled in investment and Pinjol Idle? Try hanging out at this shop
Nov 01 2019, 04:55 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Investment Alert Stalls. Photo: Sylke Febrina Laucereno / detikFinance

Jakarta - To reduce the circulation of bulging investments and illegal fintech services, the Investment Alert Task Force opens consultation and outreach services at The Gade Coffee & Gold. Chairman of the Investment Alert Task Force Tongam Lumban Tobing said in this shop, the community could consult with investment, fintech lending and illegal private liens to the public. "Warung Waspada Investments helped the public avoid illegal investment offers to protect the public, especially when we are in Jakarta for the first time next time, "said Tongam at The Gade Coffee & Gold, Ministry of BUMN, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). He explained that for the initial stage, Warung Waspada Investment will be opened every Friday at 09.00-11.00 WIB. All this time, reports or questions from the public have come in more through communication channels such as OJK 157 contact. According to him, the presence of Warung Waspada Investment is expected to increase public understanding of the benefits and risks of financial services sector services and services and to be increasingly aware of the rise of investment offers and illegal fintech lending . Until 31 October 2019, the Investment Alert Task Force found 297 new entities conducting illegal peer to peer lending activities that were not registered with the OJK. As for the total illegal fintech lending entities handled by the OJK SWI up to 31 October 2019, they reached 1,369 entities. While the total that has been handled by SWI from 2018 to 31 October 2019, namely 1,773 illegal fintech lending entities.
